name: nginx
readme:
nginx can be configured with env variables

To customize:
* Use $NGINX_CONFDIR to change the configuration directory
* Use $NGINX_TMPDIR to change the tmp directory. Use $NGINX_USER to change the user
* Use $NGINX_WEB_PORT to change the port NGINX runs on. 
 Note: This plugin uses envsubst when running `devbox services` to generate the nginx.conf file from the nginx.template file. To customize the nginx.conf file, edit the nginx.template file.
